page.title: 18SCHOOL GAMES II BROOMFIELD
page.content: {45 Home}is a game played by at least three people.One person is 'it' and the rest have to hide.There is an objective post and the people hiding have to get to the post and say "45 Home" before the person 'it' can say "45 Fred." The person 'it' has to count to 45 before the getting to the post procedure begins. If the person 'it' says "45 Fred" before Fred gets to the post he becomes 'had'.The first person in each game to be 'had' becomes 'it'. If no-one is 'had'then the person who was 'it' remains 'it'. In some games however,the last person to get to the post and not be 'had', says "45 Home save all!",and all the people that were had, become 'unhad". There is no time limit to get home.
